edu.upenn.cis.precise.openicelite.iomt.api

Interface IDriver


  • public interface IDriver
    Interface for all driver implementations
    Author:
    Hung Nguyen (hungng@seas.upenn.edu)

    • Method Detail

      • setDeviceInfo

        void setDeviceInfo(DeviceInfo info)
        Configure device with attributes (e.g., device ID, type)
        Parameters:
        info - attributes as a DeviceInfo object

      • getDeviceInfo

        DeviceInfo getDeviceInfo()
        Return device information
        Returns:
        attributes as a DeviceInfo object

      • init

        void init(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> options)
        Perform some initializing tasks if needed
        Parameters:
        options - initializing options

      • connect

        void connect(java.lang.String address,
             java.lang.String name,
             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> options)
        Initiate a connection to a device This function is blocking but driver must return immediately after success or error. Any background tasks to maintain alive connection must be running on separate threads.
        Parameters:
        address - device's serial/ethernet address
        name - identified client name (must be unique within the system)
        options - additional connecting options

      • read

        java.lang.String read(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> options)
        Blocking read a message from connected device
        Parameters:
        options - additional options
        Returns:
        a message as string

      • readBytes

        byte[] readBytes(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> options)
        Blocking read a message from connected device
        Parameters:
        options - additional options
        Returns:
        a message as byte array

      • write

        void write(java.lang.String message)
        Blocking write a message to connected device
        Parameters:
        message - a message as string

      • write

        void write(byte[] message)
        Blocking write a message to connected device
        Parameters:
        message - a message as byte array

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> options,
               IDriverCallback callback)
        Subscribe to the device events (e.g., periodic reported data)
        Parameters:
        options - additional options
        callback - the class to callback for related events

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe()
        Unsubscribe to the device events

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnect from device

      • close

        void close()
        Close and release all associated resource

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Determine if client is currently connect to a device
        Returns:
        true if connected, false otherwise.

      • setCallback

        void setCallback(IDriverCallback callback)
        Set the callback listener to use for events that happen asynchronously
        Parameters:
        callback - the class to callback for related events
